data.name: DOA5LR High Society Costume Set
data.detailed_description:
This is a High Society costume set for the characters of DOA5LR, featuring perfect weekend outfits for young Ladies!
This set includes all 17 of the High Society costumes.
This set contains costumes for the following characters:
Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, Lisa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, and Naotora Ii.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You must purchase the necessary characters before using this content.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimo:
  • SO: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Procesador: Core i7 870 over
  • Memoria: 2 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Versión 9.0c
  • Red: Conexión de banda ancha a Internet
  • Almacenamiento: 10 GB de espacio disponible
  • Tarjeta de sonido: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recomendado:
  • SO: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Procesador: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memoria: 4 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Versión 9.0c
  • Red: Conexión de banda ancha a Internet
  • Almacenamiento: 10 GB de espacio disponible
  • Tarjeta de sonido: DirectX 9.0c over
